title: F80.2
description:
Mixed receptive-expressive language disorder
Developmental dysphasia or aphasia, receptive type
Developmental Wernicke's aphasia

Excludes1: central auditory processing disorder (H93.25), dysphasia or aphasia NOS (R47.-), expressive language disorder (F80.1), expressive type dysphasia or aphasia (F80.1), word deafness (H93.25)
Excludes2: acquired aphasia with epilepsy [Landau-Kleffner] (G40.80-), pervasive developmental disorders (F84.-), selective mutism (F94.0), intellectual disabilities (F70-F79)

title: H93.25
description:
Central auditory processing disorder
Congenital auditory imperception
Word deafness
Excludes1: mixed receptive-epxressive language disorder (F80.2)
